topics.title: Describe a rainy day
topics.prompt: Describe what you usually do on a rainy day.
topics.hint: 說明下雨天你通常的活動，可以包含地點、時間和感受，3〜5句。
topics.sample: On a rainy day, I usually stay inside my house. I like to read books or watch movies. Sometimes, I drink hot tea and listen to the sound of rain. Rainy days make me feel calm and relaxed.

topics.title: Talk about your favorite weather
topics.prompt: What is your favorite type of weather and why?
topics.hint: 表達你最喜歡的天氣並解釋原因，可以談談該天氣適合做的活動，3〜5句。
topics.sample: My favorite weather is sunny and warm. I like it because I can go outside and play sports or have a picnic. The sunshine makes me happy and energetic. I don’t like when it rains all day.

topics.title: Explain why rain can be good
topics.prompt: Explain some reasons why rain is important and can be good.
topics.hint: 說明雨水的重要性，可以提到植物、環境或生活上的好處，3〜5句。
topics.sample: Rain is important because it helps plants grow. Without rain, trees and flowers cannot survive. It also fills rivers and lakes with water. Rain keeps the earth healthy and clean.

topics.title: Share a childhood memory about rain
topics.prompt: Tell a short story about a memory you have related to rain when you were a child.
topics.hint: 分享一個你小時候和雨有關的回憶，可以是快樂或特別的經驗，3〜5句。
topics.sample: When I was a child, I liked to jump in puddles after rain. One day, my friends and I played outside even though it was wet. We laughed a lot and got soaked. It was so much fun to play in the rain.

topics.title: Describe how rain affects your plans
topics.prompt: Describe a time when rain changed your plans and what you did instead.
topics.hint: 講述因為下雨改變計畫的經驗，描述當時的情況和你的反應，3〜5句。
topics.sample: Last weekend, I wanted to go to the park but it rained all day. Because of the rain, I stayed home and played board games with my family. Even though my plans changed, I still enjoyed my day.

topics.title: Imagine a world without rain
topics.prompt: Imagine what life would be like if it never rained.
topics.hint: 想像一個永遠不下雨的世界，描述會造成的影響和困難，3〜5句。
topics.sample: If it never rained, plants would die and the earth would become very dry. People and animals would have no water to drink. It would be hard to grow food. Life would be difficult and sad.

topics.title: Express feelings about rain
topics.prompt: How do you feel when it rains? Explain your feelings.
topics.hint: 說明下雨時你的感受，可以是喜歡或不喜歡，下雨的聲音或氣氛等，3〜5句。
topics.sample: I feel peaceful when it rains. The sound of rain is soft and nice. Sometimes, I feel a little sleepy and relaxed. But if it rains all day, I might feel bored.

topics.title: Describe your favorite activity on a non-rainy day
topics.prompt: What do you like to do when the weather is nice and not rainy?
topics.hint: 描述晴天或好天氣時你喜歡的活動，說明原因和情緒，3〜5句。
topics.sample: When the weather is nice, I love to go outside and ride my bike. It feels great to be in the fresh air and sunshine. I also enjoy meeting friends at the park and playing games.

topics.title: Suggest fun things to do indoors when it rains
topics.prompt: Suggest some fun activities people can do inside when it rains.
topics.hint: 建議在下雨天可以做的室內活動，盡量列出不同類型的娛樂，3〜5句。
topics.sample: When it rains, people can watch movies, read books, or play board games. Cooking or baking is also fun inside. Sometimes, listening to music or drawing is a good way to spend time.

topics.title: Describe your friends’ favorite weather
topics.prompt: Talk about the weather your friends like and why they like it.
topics.hint: 描述你朋友喜歡的天氣種類及原因，可包含不同朋友的意見，3〜5句。
topics.sample: My friends like sunny weather because they can play sports outside. Some of them like cool and rainy days because they enjoy reading or relaxing at home. Everyone has different favorite weather.
